titles.title: Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2020
Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2020

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent the temporary increase in number of judges presiding over the United States Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2020
This bill permanently increases the maximum number of judges presiding over the Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims to nine judges.
